thread.title: Monty Munford Niche social networks could prove the new Facebook
thread.title_full: Monty Munford Niche social networks could prove the new Facebook

title: Monty Munford Niche social networks could prove the new Facebook
text:
Monty Munford: Niche social networks could prove the new Facebook 
The Telegraph Saturday 24th October, 2015 
We are beginning to change the way we interact with social networks. While Facebook continues its hegemony as the king of the internet home page and Twitter transmutes into an advertising pinboard, people are looking elsewhere for discussion with their favourite audiences....
